[tags]: 
How to calculate & test for trend in time series

I have yearly rainfall projections from five climate models for the period of 2010 through 2099. 1208.44334175124, 1120.57185259478, 1014.7309899663, 1144.9384886849 )), .Names = c("Year", "CanESM2", "GFDL-ESM2M", "inmcm4", "MRI-CGCM3", "NorESM1-M"), row.names = c(NA, -90L), class = "data.frame") Based on visual analysis, I suspect that there is a increasing precip trend in all models. But I need some kind of metric that can confirm an quantify this trend. For each model in this dataset, how can I calculate the rainfall trends for every year and for decades (2010-2019, 2020-2029 and so on)? Is it a simple linear regression of year against precip sufficient to show the trend?
